meanings.definition: The use of isometric exercises to build strength.
meanings.sent1: Isometrics can help improve muscle strength without moving.
meanings.sent2: I like to include isometrics in my workout routine for better strength.
meanings.sent3: During the isometrics class, we pretended to be statues for exercise.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to isometrics turned him into a human pillar of strength.
meanings.sent5: The concept of isometrics is like flexing your muscles without flexing.

meanings.definition: A form of exercise involving static muscle contractions.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the challenge of isometrics in her fitness routine.
meanings.sent2: Isometrics require holding a position to work the muscles.
meanings.sent3: The isometrics session felt like trying to move while stuck in glue.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fitness, isometrics are the art of staying still to get stronger.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of isometrics can make you feel the burn without moving much.

meanings.definition: The practice of isometric training for muscle development.
meanings.sent1: Isometrics is a popular method for muscle growth among athletes.
meanings.sent2: The gym offers classes specifically focused on isometrics for muscle building.
meanings.sent3: He joked that isometrics training turned him into a human statue.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to isometrics transformed her muscles into steel.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of isometrics lies in the power of holding still for strength.
